entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
